input.sentences: while at the lake everybody had lunch . the kids ate macaroni .
while the adults ate fish they caught .
the kids put on life jackets before going swimming .
the adults rode in a canoe with some of the kids .
the adults almost flipped the canoe while paddling .
output.sentences: The kids ate macaroni for lunch as they sat outside by the lake.
The adults cooked a fish they caught, which they ate with fries.
In the afternoon the family  went boating, wearing their life jackets in kids sizes.
The whole family went kayaking, they rode in a yellow boat with the kids in the middle of the canoe.
When they were paddling, the boat almost flipped but the family.steadied the canoe.
